faqs.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ's)
faqs.faq1: Do you guarantee the benefits if I stick to the training ?
faqs.ans1: Yes, we guarantee the benefits when you stick to the training plan presented.
faqs.faq2: How long can I train for untill I see the results ?
faqs.ans2: By following the training plan presented to you, you will see some results when reaching half way in the plan, you will see definitive results after finishing the training plan.
faqs.faq3: How long is the subscription valid for ?
faqs.faq4: How do I give my suggestions and complaints ?
faqs.ans4: We accept all suggestions and complaints on this email Info.thetopplayer@gmail.com

fitness.title: Fitness Program
fitness.line2: 5 days training and 2 days rest per week.

fitness.line5: The subscription is valid for 3 months .

fitness_fottboll.title: Fitness + Football Program
fitness_fottboll.line1: Training duration is 8 weeks. (4 weeks) for Fitness program & (4 weeks) for football program

football.title: Football Program
football.line2: 5 days training and 2 days rest per week.
football.line4: 1st touch, control, passing , receiving, shooting and dribbling.
football.line5: The subscription is valid for 3 months .

weeks.description3: Repetition and consistency are key factors in reaching the desired goal.
weeks.description4: By the end of the program, you will be able to see the difference between the first and last week.
weeks.description1: You will learn how to enhance your strengths and overcome your weaknesses.
weeks.description2: Avoid seeking immediate results and focus on eliminating errors during the exercise.
